statements: SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feed;
SELECT feed_name, threat_category FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_level='high';
SELECT feed_id, feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_level='medium' ORDER BY feed_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(feed_id) AS feed_count FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_category='malware' GROUP BY threat_category;
SELECT feed_name, update_frequency FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_category='phishing' AND update_frequency > 24;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_category = 'Malware' ORDER BY feed_name ASC, feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feed_id, feed_name, update_frequency FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_level = 'high' ORDER BY feed_id;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE update_frequency > 30 AND threat_level IN ('medium', 'high') ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT feed_name, threat_category FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE update_frequency <= 7 AND threat_category <> 'Phishing';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE feed_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY feed_id DESC, update_frequency ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_id = 1;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds INNER JOIN cyber_threats ON threat_intelligence_feeds.feed_id = cyber_threats.threat_id;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_id = 1;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY feed_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_name LIKE '%threat%';
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_name = 'Malware Feed';
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_level > 7 ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_description FROM threat_intelligence_feeds ORDER BY feed_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'IP';
SELECT indicator_value, indicator_description FROM indicators WHERE feed_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_type DESC, alert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_description FROM threat_intelligence_feeds ORDER BY feed_id DESC;
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value, feed_name FROM indicators JOIN threat_intelligence_feeds ON indicators.feed_id = threat_intelligence_feeds.feed_id WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware';
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM indicators JOIN threat_intelligence_feeds ON indicators.feed_id = threat_intelligence_feeds.feed_id WHERE feed_name LIKE '%ransomware%' AND indicator_type = 'IP' ORDER BY feed_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeed;
SELECT ThreatActorID, Name, Description FROM ThreatActor;
SELECT * FROM MalwareSample WHERE Type = 'Trojan';
SELECT IncidentID, Description, ReportDate FROM IncidentReport ORDER BY ReportDate DESC;
SELECT ThreatActorID, Name, Description FROM ThreatActor WHERE Country = 'Russia';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeed WHERE feed_type = 'APT' ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT actor_name, country FROM ThreatActor WHERE threat_level = 'high' ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT * FROM MalwareSample WHERE signature LIKE '%ransomware%' AND file_type = 'exe' LIMIT 5
SELECT incident_id, reporter_email, status FROM IncidentReport WHERE status IN ('open', 'in progress') AND reported_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY reported_date DESC
SELECT incident_id, description, affected_systems FROM IncidentReport WHERE severity = 'critical' ORDER BY affected_systems DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feed;
SELECT feed_name, threat_type FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT * FROM detected_threats ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT event_time, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT threat_id, mitigation_description FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE threat_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY feed_name ASC;
SELECT id, feed_name, threat_type FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY threat_type DESC, feed_name ASC;
SELECT feed_name, threat_description FROM threat_intelligence_feed WHERE LENGTH(threat_description) > 100 ORDER BY feed_name DESC;

SELECT tif.feed_name, dt.threat_level, se.event_description FROM threat_intelligence_feed tif JOIN detected_threats dt ON tif.id = dt.threat_id JOIN security_events se ON se.event_type = dt.detection_method WHERE dt.detection_method = 'Firewall' ORDER BY tif.feed_name ASC, dt.threat_level DESC;
SELECT tl.log_time, ts.mitigation_description FROM threat_log tl JOIN mitigation_strategies ts ON tl.threat_id = ts.threat_id WHERE tl.log_details LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY tl.log_time DESC;
